data.expected_result: It should lead you to the settings.
data.short_description: When rotating the screen in the "Password Manager" screen, pressing on the "Open settings" does nothing.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the log-in screen. - Find "Use a password manager". Click on it. - "Password Manager" screen should pop up, with the option of "cancel" and "Open settings". Rotate your screen. - After rotation, click on "Open settings".
